responses: Elon Musk South African-born American entrepreneur who cofounded the electronic-payment firm PayPal and formed SpaceX, maker of launch vehicles and spacecraft.

Jeffrey Preston Bezos is an American entrepreneur, media proprietor, investor, and computer engineer. He is the founder and executive chairman of Amazon, where he previously served as the chairman, president, and CEO
Bill Gates is an American business magnate, software developer, investor, author, and philanthropist. He is a co-founder of Microsoft Corporation
